title: Steak & Onion Grilled Cheese
directions: Preheat the cooking pan on medium heat with a little bit of oil.
Season the steak with salt and pepper and saute until it reaches desired temperature. Set aside to cool until it can be handled.
Meanwhile, saute onions in the same pan with a little bit of salt, on medium-high heat, until golden brown. Set aside.
Layer bread, half the cheese, steak, onions, remaining cheese and second slice of bread in the cooking pan.
Cook on medium until the cheese is melted and bread is nicely toasted.
ingredients: 2 oz sliced sharp white cheddar (My favorite is Cabot)
